Surface Water

Michael Rustler

2022-06-30 05:16:06

Source: vignettes/surface-water.Rmd
surface-water.Rmd
library(wasserportal)

stations <- wasserportal::get_stations()
#> Importing 9 station overviews from Wasserportal Berlin ... ok. (8.71s)
stations_crosstable <-  stations$crosstable

stations_crosstable_bb <- stations_crosstable %>%
  dplyr::filter(stringr::str_detect(.data$Messstellennummer,
                                    pattern = "^[A-Z]{2}_"))
stations_crosstable_bb
#> # A tibble: 5 × 11
#>   Messstellennummer Messstellenname ws    df    wt    lf    ph    og    os   
#>   <chr>             <chr>           <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 SP_0150           Beeskow         NA    NA    x     x     x     x     x    
#> 2 TK_0025           Kleinmachnow    NA    NA    x     x     x     x     x    
#> 3 SP_0130           Leibsch         NA    NA    x     x     x     x     x    
#> 4 SP_0050           Neuhausen       NA    NA    x     x     x     x     x    
#> 5 HV_0110           Potsdam         NA    NA    x     x     x     x     x    
#> # … with 2 more variables: gws <chr>, gwq <chr>

stations_crosstable_berlin <- stations_crosstable %>%
  dplyr::filter(stringr::str_detect(.data$Messstellennummer,
                                    pattern = "^[A-Z]{2}_",
                                    negate = TRUE))
stations_crosstable_berlin
#> # A tibble: 994 × 11
#>    Messstellennummer Messstellenname   ws    df    wt    lf    ph    og    os   
#>    <chr>             <chr>             <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#>  1 5865900           Allee der Kosmon… x     NA    NA    NA    NA    NA    NA   
#>  2 5827103           Allendestraße     x     x     NA    NA    NA    NA    NA

#>  5 5819900           Am Freibad        x     NA    NA    NA    NA    NA    NA   
#>  6 5864801           Am Kienberg       x     x     NA    NA    NA    NA    NA

station_crosstable_berlin <- stations_crosstable_berlin[1,]
stations_crosstable_berlin
#> # A tibble: 994 × 11
#>    Messstellennummer Messstellenname   ws    df    wt    lf    ph    og    os   
#>    <chr>             <chr>             <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#>  1 5865900           Allee der Kosmon… x     NA    NA    NA    NA    NA    NA

from_date <- "1900-01-01"
sw_station_berlin_daily <- wasserportal::read_wasserportal_raw(
  station = station_crosstable_berlin$Messstellennummer,
  variable = get_station_variables(stations_crosstable_berlin)[1],
  type = "daily",
  from_date = from_date,
  include_raw_time = TRUE,
  stations_crosstable = stations_crosstable_berlin
)
#>  ... ok. (1.36s)

str(sw_station_berlin_daily)
#> 'data.frame':    8278 obs. of  2 variables:
#>  $ Datum          : chr  "01.11.1999" "02.11.1999" "03.11.1999" "04.11.1999" ...
#>  $ Tagesmittelwert: int  16 23 19 17 17 15 14 14 19 19 ...
#>  - attr(*, "metadata")= chr [1:5] "Stationsnummer: 5865900" "Stationsname: Allee der Kosmonauten" "Gewässer: M.-H.-Grenzgr." "Wasserstand in cm" ...



stations_berlin <- stations_crosstable_berlin$Messstellennummer[1:5]

sw_stations_berlin_daily <- stats::setNames(lapply(stations_berlin,
                   function(station) {
                     msg <- sprintf("Fetching data for station '%s'", station)
                     kwb.utils::catAndRun(msg, expr = {
                     wasserportal::read_wasserportal(
  station = station,
  type = "daily",
  from_date = from_date,
  include_raw_time = TRUE,
  stations_crosstable = stations_crosstable
)})}
), nm = stations_berlin)
#> Fetching data for station '5865900' ...  ... ok. (0.77s)
#> Warning in warning_not_implemented("merge_raw_results_daily()"):
#> merge_raw_results_daily() is not yet implemented. Returning raw data
#> ok. (0.83s)
